content: malabrigo neck thingie you have your malabrigo hand thingies and possibly your head thingie now it s time to knit the neck thingie so soft warm and cuddly yarn 1 skein malabrigo worsted 3 5 oz 216 yards color stonechat needle 16 circular size 9us 5 5mm notions 1 stitch marker blunt darning needle gauge 18 sts and 28 row = 4 10cm in pattern stitch size one size = 22 around x 10 high pattern stitch round 1 knit 3 slip 1 round 2 knit around note always slip stitches purlwise abbreviations co = cast on bobble = bind off k = knit p = purl sts = stitches co 100 sts on sz 9 circulars using long tail method or your preferred method of co join being careful not to twist stitches and place marker rnds 1 & 2 purl around rnds 3-5 knit around rnds 6 & 7 p around rnds 8-10 k around rnds 11 & 12 p around next knit rounds 1 & 2 of the pattern stitch for appx 6 5 inches or 44 rounds repeat rounds 1-12 once more bobble purlwise finishing weave in loose ends lightly steam or block to your specifications wear and enjoy contact nanoeffects@gmail com blog http //nanoeffects blogspot com/ and http //a-nano-knittomy blogspot com/ this pattern is free for unlimited personal use you may bookmark it print it copy and paste it you can even make paper airplanes from your printed copy if you like just let people who are interested know where you got it
